name: Mystery Trackers: Blackrow's Secret HD - A Hidden Object Detective Game
name_original: Mystery Trackers: Blackrow's Secret HD - A Hidden Object Detective Game
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

It’s been two hundred years since the plague swept through here… Authorities quarantined the area around Blackrow Mansion, and it hasn’t been opened since. But now, an up-and-coming starlet is receiving strange threats that have drawn her straight to the quarantine zone!

• INVESTIGATE A SUPPOSEDLY ABANDONED TOWN
Discover the truth hidden behind the darkness of Blackrow, a place that hasn’t seen the light of day in centuries but isn’t as abandoned as it seems.

• SEARCH FOR NORMA IN THE FORBIDDEN DISTRICT
A famous superstar has been kidnapped by a mysterious figure before your very eyes! Head to the Forbidden District to find Norma and uncover the dark truth.

• FOLLOW A MYSTERY THROUGH THRILLING TWISTS AND TURNS
Play innovative new mini-games and explore gorgeous hidden-object puzzles as you track down the truth behind Blackrow’s secret!

• UNLOCK THIS COLLECTOR’S EDITION TO ACCESS THE SECRET ROOM!
Reveal special hidden glass pieces scattered throughout the game to form a beautiful mosaic! Plus, enjoy exclusive extras such as intriguing wallpapers and concept art gallery!
